title: City government attempts to reduce digital divide

content.question: A city government is attempting to reduce the digital divide between groups with differing access to computing and the Internet. Which of the following activities is LEAST likely to be effective in this purpose?

choices.label: Holding basic computer classes at community centers
Providing free wireless Internet connections at locations in low-income neighborhoods
Putting all government forms on the city Web site
Requiring that every city school has computers that meet a minimum hardware and software standard

content.answer: Putting all government forms on the city Web site

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Describe the impact of a computing innovation.
